isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE / 9200 9300 9400 MODELS BUILT AFTER JANUARY 1, 1995 - ELECTRONIC ENGINE CONTROLS - CUMMINS PT PACER - 1991 - TROUBLESHOOTING

svcproc.title: TROUBLESHOOTING
svcproc.para: The PT Pacer does not have any controls or lamps on the instrument panel. All service for the PT Pacer Unit must be performed using off-board tools (See SERVICE TOOLS). Circuit diagrams and component locations are included of the installation in this section.
Consult the Cummins PT Pacer System Installation Manual or the Cummins Troubleshooting and Repair Manual for proper troubleshooting procedures, specifications and fault code descriptions.
